page.title: 19ONGAR'S PUBS
page.content: { THE RED COW}has two bars,serves a wide range of food, and is a modern pub compared to the others in the area. { THE COCK TAVERN}is opposite the Budworth Hall, serves food except on sundays and has a large bar. { THE KINGS HEAD}is an old pub with character.It was once a coaching inn and serves food lunchtimes and evenings. { THE BELL}dates back to the 1700's and is in the middle of the town. { THE ROYAL OAK}, various parts of the pub are between 150 and 400 years old. { THE TWO BREWERS}dates back to the fifteen hundreds and serves sunday lunches. { THE STAG PUB}is on the main road to Brentwood (A128) and is an old pub dating back 250 years.
